block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: Analog Input uses this block Select the input pin from the drop down list Can click on the block to get the value of the input at the pin
12 (ADC) 0-4095 0-3.3V it is a 12-bit Analog-to-Digital-Converter (ADC) return value is 0-4095 corresponding to input voltage of 0-3.3V
